ygData.subject: Re: Necro Spells..?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah. That is right. All merchants, pretty much KOS a necromancer. However the guards are relatively friendly. (They don t KOS) ... From:  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah. That is right. All merchants, pretty much KOS a necromancer. However
the guards are relatively friendly. (They don't KOS)
----- Original Message -----
From: <TkAdam@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 2:44 AM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Re: Necro Spells..?


> From: TkAdam@...
>
> In a message dated 4/27/99 4:25:10 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
puma@...
> writes:
>
> > Also does anyone know where this guy is I am
> > looking for?
>
> He is in the West Commonlands. Near (but not at) the toll post.
>
> Also be carefull... the merchants in the Commonlands (not the guards)
treat
> you as KOS... so don't go into any of the buildings.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Are you hogging all the fun?
